name: Fredbear's Nightmare
description:
Sequal to Fredbear's Reopening.

This is a horror game! There are flashing lights, loud sounds, and jumpscares.

Press P to flash the camera. You only have a certain amount of space in your camera. If there is a bug, just click the flag twice.

Credits:

All graphics are stock images. All sounds by me. Voice acting by me. Title theme (Void) by Scott Cawthon.

Version 1.1
